section.title: Mailing lists
section.para: Communication is handled by Google Groups tools. It offers a regular mailing list as well as archive management.

primary.title: Announces list
primary.para: This list is very low traffic and only the team can post messages to this list. You can visit the list Google Groups page or send an email to expath-announces+subscribe@googlegroups.com to subscribe.

primary.title: General list
primary.para: The list for all discussions about EXPath. You can visit the list Google Groups page or send an email to expath+subscribe@googlegroups.com to subscribe. Post to expath@googlegroups.com.
